Columns.Description: The identifier for the audit event, unique across services.
Columns.Name: Id

Columns.Description: CorrelationId allows two or more auditing events to be grouped together. This happens when a single action causes a cascade of auditing entries. An example being project creation.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: Unique identifier for the action that occurred.
Columns.Name: ActivityId

Columns.Description: A consistently unique identifier for the actor that caused the auditing event.
Columns.Name: ActorCUID

Columns.Description: The actor's user identifier.
Columns.Name: ActorUserId

Columns.Description: The actor's user principal name.
Columns.Name: ActorUPN

Columns.Description: Type of authentication used by the actor.
Columns.Name: AuthenticationMechanism

Columns.Description: The time the auditing event occurred in UTC.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The level (scope) that the event occurred.
Columns.Name: ScopeType

Columns.Description: User friendly name for the scope level that an auditing event occurred at.
Columns.Name: ScopeDisplayName

Columns.Description: The organization identifier.
Columns.Name: ScopeId

Columns.Description: Unique identifier of the project that an auditing event occurred in. If not provided then the event isn't scoped to a particular project.
Columns.Name: ProjectId

Columns.Description: Friendly name of the project that an auditing event occurred in. If not provided then the event isn't scoped to a particular project.
Columns.Name: ProjectName

Columns.Description: IP address where the event originated.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The user agent from the request.
Columns.Name: UserAgent

Columns.Description: The unique identifier for the type of auditing event that occurred. For example, Git.CreateRepo identifies the an auditing event for Git repository creation.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: Additional data that's unique to the type of auditing event.
Columns.Name: Data

Columns.Description: Description of what happened.
Columns.Name: Details

Columns.Description: Part of the Azure DevOps product where the auditing event occurred.
Columns.Name: Area

Columns.Description: Type of action that occurred when the auditing event was logged.
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: Type of action that occurred when the auditing event was logged.
Columns.Name: CategoryDisplayName

Columns.Description: Display name of the user who initiated the auditing event to be logged.
Columns.Name: ActorDisplayName

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type
